div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1832 Bhir Mound, 1913 (1070) Burial: c. 240-200 B.C. (M) Contents: 1 AV, 166 AR. Found with jewelry Antiochus II: 1 AV st. (Bactra, portrait of Diodotus) Indian punch-marked coins: 166 AR (de- based) Disposition: Taxila; New Delhi Marshall, Taxila 1-2 (Cambridge, 1951), pp. 105-6, 110-11, 751, 798, 835, 843, 850-2, 854
